contentfulProduct.seoDescription: Made from a soft, drapey fabric, these shorts feature angled front and back patch pockets. P.S. they pair perfectly with the camp shirt.
contentfulProduct.title: Vintage Wash Tencel Utility Short

content.value: Buy 2, save $5
Made from a soft, drapey fabric, these shorts feature angled front and back patch pockets. P.S. they pair perfectly with the camp shirt.
Material: 100% Tencel
Lyocell is a biodegradable fabric made from cellulose found in wood pulp. It is softer, more breathable, and uses 10-20 times less water in production compared to cotton
Wrinkle resistant, shrink resistant, and static resistant
Inseam: 2.75"
Garment-dyed using Azo free dyes to give each garment a vintage one-of-a-kind look
Elastic waistband with metal drawstring tips
Front angled and back patch pockets
Produced in BSCI (Business Social Compliance Initiative) and Sedex certified factories which aims to improve working conditions throughout the supply chain
Origin: Gurugram, India
Model is 5'9" and wearing a size Small
Machine wash cold

productDetails.productDetails:
• Material: 100% Tencel
  • Lyocell is a biodegradable fabric made from cellulose found in wood pulp. It is softer, more breathable, and uses 10-20 times less water in production compared to cotton
  • Wrinkle resistant, shrink resistant, and static resistant
  • Inseam: 2.75"
  • Garment-dyed using Azo free dyes to give each garment a vintage one-of-a-kind look
  • Elastic waistband with metal drawstring tips
  • Front angled and back patch pockets
  • Produced in BSCI (Business Social Compliance Initiative) and Sedex certified factories which aims to improve working conditions throughout the supply chain
  • Origin: Gurugram, India
  • Model is 5'9" and wearing a size Small

productDescription.productDescription: Made from a soft, drapey fabric, these shorts feature angled front and back patch pockets. P.S. they pair perfectly with the camp shirt.

content.value: "Quince’s new rug collection is hand knotted and tufted by artisans in India. Best of all, the prices are fairly reasonable for the top-notch quality you’re getting."
Five-star reviews
Five-star reviews
What our customers are saying
What our customers are saying
"We've got you covered with this very affordable cashmere sweater that somehow clocks in at a miraculous 50 buckeroos."
"New Online Fashion Brand Aims To Get Eco-Friendly Clothes From Factory-To-Closet At Affordable Prices."
Quince Cashmere Robe
- The best robes of 2021."
"While D2C brands have changed the way we shop,
Quince
is looking to change retail even more dramatically."
"A cashmere crewneck for $50?! It’s now a reality — in 10 colors — thanks to Quince."
"The brand connects with factories to sell direct to the customer, promising consumers better prices and factories with better margins."
"The Quince Organic Percale Luxe Sheet Set collection is an excellent choice for anyone who sleeps hot at night."
"You can get a cashmere sweater for only $50 from this radically transparent basics company."
"My next plane outfit when I can travel again."
"These Luxurious Linen Sheets Make Me Feel Like I’m Sleeping in a Fancy Hotel"
